data.title: Honouring Gabrielle Bryce — Daniel Ng’s Wife: Multiple Strokes and Barely Speaking, She Continues To Inspire
data.meta_description: If you haven’t yet had the pleasure of connecting with Daniel Ng and his beautiful writing, please do yourself a favour and check out his work. Daniel has been a regular writer on Hope, Healing and…
data.text:
Updating this piece after publishing: On April 30, Gabrielle returned to spirit, leaving a broken-hearted husband and countless loved ones who adored her. To honour this incredible woman, I want to leave this story available for those who did not get a chance to know her, and so you can offer your support to Daniel.

If you haven’t yet had the pleasure of connecting with Daniel Ng and his beautiful writing, please do yourself a favour and check out his work.

Daniel has been a regular writer on Hope, Healing and Humour for a while now. In spite of some significant challenges in his personal life, he always contributes stories of overcoming obstacles or working his way through dark times with a positive and inspiring attitude that is nothing short of infectious.

Daniel met his beloved wife, Gabrielle, pictured on the album cover above, later in life than many who are marrying for the first time. An introvert his entire life, Gabrielle saw the beautiful soul that was hiding behind his quiet exterior. She lit up his life, as he did hers. And for a few short years, they…
